item.description: Ever wonder when you should start talking to your kids about the birds and bees? How do you start, how much do you tell your child, when do you start, are there any good books to start the discussion? Join us for a night of question and answers. Our special guest will be Jane Detwiler, MS. Certified by the American Association of Sexuality Educators, Counselors and Therapists (AASECT), Jane has decades of experience teaching and training both adolescents and adults and currently is a consultant for Our Whole Lives; a comprehensive sexuality education program.
item.name: How to Talk to Kids About Sex
